Name: Desert Battle
About the game: In the hot sun hot endless desert. Heavy machine guns like artillery firing bullets whizzing, variation of wolves came workingman and incredible robot. How to capture the mystery of the base. Customs clearance challenge type of shooting game, please hold out until the last second.
